title.value: V2 Table Code System: Acknowledgment code

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying acknowledgment codes. For details of usage, see message processing rules in the published Standard. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the MSA segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0008 (Acknowledgment code)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Original mode: Application Accept - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Accept

definition.value: Original mode: Application Accept - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Accept

display.value: Original mode: Application Error - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Error

definition.value: Original mode: Application Error - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Error

display.value: Original mode: Application Reject - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Reject

definition.value: Original mode: Application Reject - Enhanced mode: Application acknowledgment: Reject

definition.value: Enhanced mode: Accept acknowledgment: Commit Accept
